description: This file defines the main 'Home' component for a note-taking application's frontend. It includes UI layout, state management, and event handling for displaying, editing, deleting, and creating notes, using LightningJS component framework.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: Main LightningJS component managing notes display, editing, and UI interactions.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a locale string for display.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Handles the selection of a note for viewing.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves a note; updates or adds a new note based on mode.

methods.name: handleCreateNew
methods.description: Prepares the UI for creating a new note.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Sets mode to editing the current note.
